extendedInfo.description: Thirty-One's National Conference is our biggest celebration of the year! We have created an app to help share information while we come together to celebrate, encourage and reward our sales field for their extraordinary accomplishments. thirty-one, 31 gifts, thirty one gifts, 2013 national conference, 31 conference, 31 nc 2013

reviews.title: Worthless
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work properly even after doing every single thing as directed. Still can\'t access my schedule, attendees or alerts! Worthless
reviews.author: Bobbi Hollars

reviews.title: Soooo over this app!
reviews.comment: App has yet to work properly. I have had app support walk me through the process three times!
reviews.author: Tara Grant

reviews.title: awful
reviews.comment: This is the most annoying app ever. It doesn\'t work properly I can\'t get my personal schedule to come up and tech supprt was no help and doesn\'t know what\'s wrong either. If they don\'t know how should I???
reviews.author: Brittney Jump

reviews.title: Not user-friendly/poorfunctionality
reviews.comment: I have had several problems trying to use this app. I am unable to access personalized areas such as attendees and my personal schedule. I\'m hoping to be able to use the map still. I\'ve reinstalled at least three times and cleared my cache and cookies as well. I\'ve also contacted app support and they were unable to help.
reviews.author: Amanda Lee

reviews.title: Thia app is awful!
reviews.comment: I\'ve installed and uninstalled it on 3 different devices and none of them have been able to get beyond a blank pink page. If the other pages exist they are stuck on stupid somewhere. I have better things to do with my time than try to make a poorly designed app work.
reviews.author: Cyndi McGrath

reviews.title: Once email is set works great
reviews.comment: Follow directions on TOT for success.
reviews.author: Kim Staples

reviews.title: Not ideal
reviews.comment: This app has not worked well at all and the cust svc at Crowd Compass leaves MUCH to be desired w/ continual interrupting & rudeness. Trying to re-install for the 5th time to see if it can link up my personal info. Def a frustrating & time-consuming app.
reviews.author: Amy Williams

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Followed all directions.  Reinstalled 10 times.  Constantly on the phone with tech support and always told it will be fixed in the morning.  It\'s been over a week now and still attendee and schedule doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: Cinnamon Brown

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I\'ve done everything suggested (used my31 email, changed password, cleared history/cookies, uninstalled/reinstalled multiple times) and I still can\'t access attendees or my schedule. Not even going to bother with the scavenger hunt Fri.
reviews.author: Jessica Myers

reviews.title: Event won\'t Download
reviews.comment: Attempted a few times and can\'t get the conference event to load which is my sole reason for hang this app.
reviews.author: Sara Layton

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t allow you to sign in and upload events and other information. Stuck on the home menu
reviews.author: Eunice Gonzales

reviews.title: Great idea, awful app
reviews.comment: Didnt work any of the 15 times I tried to install. So sad to miss out on this.
reviews.author: Holly Rhodes

reviews.title: Works on droid bionic
reviews.comment: If you only get a pink screen with a search box, type celebrate31 in the box.
reviews.author: Lindsay Inger

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love it!
reviews.author: Chris Serger

reviews.title: This is not user friendly!
reviews.comment: This is not user friendly!
reviews.author: Tina Stites

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Wish schedule was a little easier to use
reviews.author: Amber Closs

reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: Sherry Bankston

reviews.title: Wait until next week
reviews.comment: It may not work correctly until next week.
reviews.author: Traci Hammel

reviews.title: Nothing
reviews.comment: Force close just when clicking on the app.
reviews.author: Jenn Philbrick

reviews.comment: After reinstalling 4 times I was able to utilize this app. One of the biggest issues I had was using the attendees button. It took me almost 6 minutes to scroll through the A\'s. Would it be possible to have an alphabet box on top. If your name was Zelma Sender it would take 6 days to find it.
reviews.author: A Google User
